text: Temporal analysis of the <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> down - regulatory effect on the <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - , <extra_id_0> IL-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - , or <extra_id_0> GM-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - induced proinflammatory cytokine gene expression in monocytes provided evidence that <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> acts predominantly on the post - transcriptional level .
